Name: Shriekmaw
Text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)\nWhen Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.\nEvoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. Name: Wren's Run Packmaster
Text: Champion an Elf (When this creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Elf you control. When this creature leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)\n{2}{G}: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.\nWolves you control have deathtouch.
